TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IScriptControl

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件为在启用 AJAX 的应用程序中定义 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 资源而必须实现的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that ASP.NET server controls must implement to define ECMAScript (JavaScript) resources in AJAX-enabled applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当由类实现时, 接口的方法提供对脚本库的引用, 这些库定义表示客户端类型实例的客户端组件和脚本说明符。When implemented by a class, the methods of the interface provide references to script libraries that define client components and script descriptors that represent instances of client types. 在将包含脚本控件功能的自定义服务器控件中实现此接口。Implement this interface in custom server controls that will include script control functionality. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[将客户端功能添加到 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d365cbe-1bde-4cef-9fe7-2cd04d3cbdea)。For more information, see [Adding Client Capabilities to a Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d365cbe-1bde-4cef-9fe7-2cd04d3cbdea).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> GetScriptDescriptors() cil managed
Public Function GetScriptDescriptors () As IEnumerable(Of ScriptDescriptor)

summary.span: 获取表示 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 客户端组件的脚本描述符的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of script descriptors that represent ECMAScript (JavaScript) client components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法可从 Microsoft Ajax 库中定义服务器控件需要的组件、行为或客户端控件。Implement this method to define components, behaviors, or client controls from the Microsoft Ajax Library that the server control requires. 此方法使你能够以声明方式将指定参数传递到 Microsoft Ajax 库函数。This method enables you to pass declaratively specified parameters to Microsoft Ajax Library functions. 若要使用此方法, 还必须实现抽象类。To use this method, you must also implement the abstract class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> GetScriptReferences() cil managed
Public Function GetScriptReferences () As IEnumerable(Of ScriptReference)

summary.span: 获取用于定义该控件所需的脚本资源的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define script resources that the control requires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法可定义服务器控件需要的自定义脚本库依赖项, 如当前 Web 应用程序的脚本文件夹中的脚本或程序集中的资源。Implement this method to define custom script library dependencies that the server control requires, such as scripts in a Scripts folder of the current Web application, or resources in an assembly. 不必以这种方式注册 Microsoft Ajax 库中的脚本。Scripts from the Microsoft Ajax Library do not have to be registered in this manner.
